 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָלַל‎</span>]<sub>82</sub> **verb** ==be slight, swift, trifling== (probably originally ***be light***; Late Hebrew [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָלַל‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִלֵּל‎</span>=Biblical Hebrew; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***‡alâlu***</u></abbr> II. ***depise, dishonour***; so Tel Amarna (apparently Canaanism); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be small, scanty***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קללם‎</span> ***scanty*** Hal 143.8f. (compare Fell<sup>ZMG liv (1900), 246</sup>); Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be light, Small, easy***; II. ***despise***; Targum <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְלַל‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = Biblical Hebrew; also (see **Pilpel**, etc.) Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***shake***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: ***vibrate, whirl*** (of sword), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: ***see be shaken***; — [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>ZAW xi (1891), 170 ff.</sup> thinks ***shake*** original, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַקֵּל‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַלּוֺתָ‎</span> [[Nah.1.14|Nah 1:14]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַלֹּתי‎</span> [[Job.40.4|Job 40:4]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַלּוּ‎</span> [[Gen.8.11|Gen 8:11]] +; ***Imperfect***. 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתֵּקַל‎</span> [[Gen.16.4|Gen 16:4]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאֵקַל‎</span> v[[Gen.16.5|Gen 16:5]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵָ֑קלּוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.2.30|1Sam 2:30]] — 

**1.** ***be slight***, of water, ***be abated***, fr off (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span>) earth [[Gen.8.8|Gen 8:8]]; [[Gen.8.11|Gen 8:11]]([[BDB#J|J]]). 

**2.** ***be swift***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> compare, of warriors [[2Sam.1.23|2Sam 1:23]], horses [[Jer.4.13|Jer 4:13]]; [[Hab.1.8|Hab 1:8]] one's days [[Job.7.6|Job 7:6]]; [[Job.9.25|Job 9:25]]. 

**3.** ***trifling***, i.e. of little account., of person, [[Gen.16.4|Gen 16:4]]; [[Gen.16.5|Gen 16:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; both with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעֵינֶיהָ‎</span>; [[1Sam.2.30|1Sam 2:30]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲכַבֵּד‎</span>). **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקֵל‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]] §67 t.) [[2Kgs.20.30|2Kgs 20:30]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנָקַל‎</span> consecutive [[2Kgs.3.18|2Kgs 3:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקָ֑ל‎</span> [[Prov.14.6|Prov 14:6]] 1 singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּנְקַלֹּתִי‎</span> [[2Sam.6.22|2Sam 6:22]] ***Imperfect***3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקַּ֫לּוּ‎</span> [[Isa.30.16|Isa 30:16]] ***Participle*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְקַלָּה‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span>) [[Jer.6.14|Jer 6:14]]: + 2 t ; — 

**1.** ***shew oneself swift*** [[Isa.30.16|Isa 30:16]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלקַֿל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִרְכָּ֑ב‎</span>).


**2.** ***appear trifling***, [[1Sam.18.23|1Sam 18:23]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעֵינֵיכֶם‎</span>; Infinitive subject, compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]), with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> compare ***be too trifling*** [[Isa.49.6|Isa 49:6]], especially of sin [[1Kgs.16.31|1Kgs 16:31]] (Infinitive subject), and (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> compare) [[Ezek.8.17|Ezek 8:17]] ***easy*** [[2Kgs.3.18|2Kgs 3:18]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעֵנַי‎</span>), [[2Kgs.20.10|2Kgs 20:10]] (c. Infinitive), [[Prov.14.6|Prov 14:6]] ***Participle*** (as substantive) with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> in adverb phrase<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלנְֿקַלָּה‎</span> ***lightly*** i.e. superficially, [[Jer.6.14|Jer 6:14]]; [[Jer.8.11|Jer 8:11]]. 

**3.** ***be lightly esteemed*** [[2Sam.6.22|2Sam 6:22]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁפָל‎</span>; opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִכָּכֵ֑דָה‎</span>). **Pi\`el**<sub>40</sub> ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִלֵּל‎</span> [[2Sam.19.22|2Sam 19:22]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְקַלֵּל‎</span> [[Lev.20.9|Lev 20:9]] +, etc : ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַלֵּל‎</span> [[2Sam.16.10|2Sam 16:10]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַלֵּל‎</span> [[Gen.8.21|Gen 8:21]]: [[Josh.24.9|Josh 24:9]], etc.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְקַלֵּל‎</span> [[Exod.21.17|Exod 21:17]] +; suffix<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֻלֹּה מקללוני‎</span> [[Jer.15.10|Jer 15:10]], read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְקַלְלַוְנִי‎</span>! ([[BDB#Baer|Baer]]); error for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֻּלְּהֶם קִלְלוּנִי‎</span> [[BDB#JDMich|JDMich]] [[BDB#Gf|Gf]] [[BDB#Gie|Gie]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] and others, etc.; — ***curse*** (properly ***make contemptible***): 

**1.** with accusative of person homin. [[Exod.21.27|Exod 21:27]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Gen.12.3|Gen 12:3]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Lev.19.14|Lev 19:14]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), [[Judg.9.27|Judg 9:27]]; [[2Sam.16.9|2Sam 16:9]] + 16 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִלְלַנִי קְלָלָה‎</span> [[1Kgs.2.8|1Kgs 2:8]] object omitted [[2Sam.16.5|2Sam 16:5]]; [[2Sam.16.7|2Sam 16:7]]; [[2Sam.16.10|2Sam 16:10]]; [[2Sam.16.11|2Sam 16:11]]; [[2Sam.16.13|2Sam 16:13]]; [[Ps.62.5|Ps 62:5]]; [[Ps.109.28|Ps 109:28]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּרַךְ‎</span>); acc person + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of oath [[1Sam.17.43|1Sam 17:43]]; [[2Kgs.2.24|2Kgs 2:24]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> of oath alone [[Isa.8.21|Isa 8:21]]. 

**2.** with accusative dei [[Exod.22.27|Exod 22:27]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Lev.24.15|Lev 24:15]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), [[1Sam.3.13|1Sam 3:13]] (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱלֹהִים‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎להֶם‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] Comm.), + (object omitted) [[Lev.24.11|Lev 24:11]]; [[Lev.24.14|Lev 24:14]]; [[Lev.24.23|Lev 24:23]] 

**3.** with accusative of thing [[Gen.8.21|Gen 8:21]](<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject), [[Job.3.1|Job 3:1]]. **Pu\`al** ***Imperfect***) 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְקֻלָּ֑ל‎</span> [[Isa.65.20|Isa 65:20]] ***be cursed*** by death; 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּקֻלַּל‎</span> [[Job.24.18|Job 24:18]] their portion ***is cursed***; ***Participle*** plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְקֻלָּלָיו‎</span> [[Ps.37.22|Ps 37:22]]= ***those cursed by him*** (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְברָכָיו‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵקַל‎</span> [[Isa.8.23|Isa 8:23]] 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֱקִלֹּחַנִי‎</span> [[2Sam.19.44|2Sam 19:44]] ([[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] -<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲ‎</span>); 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵקַלּוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.22.7|Ezek 22:7]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָקֵל‎</span> [[1Sam.6.5|1Sam 6:5]] ***Imperative*** masculine singular; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָקֵל‎</span> [[Exod.18.22|Exod 18:22]]+; ***Infinitive construct id.***, [[Isa.23.9|Isa 23:9]]; [[Jonah.1.5|Jonah 1:5]] — 

**1.** ***make light, lighten***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָקֵל אֶתיָֿדוֺ מֵעֲלֵיכֶם‎</span> [[1Sam.6.5|1Sam 6:5]] ***he will lighten his hand from upon you***; c,. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span> person alone, ***make light from upon*** one, lighten one's burden [[Exod.18.22|Exod 18:22]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Jonah.1.5|Jonah 1:5]]; [[1Kgs.12.10|1Kgs 12:10]] = [[2Chr.10.10|2Chr 10:10]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> partitive [[1Kgs.12.4|1Kgs 12:4]]; [[1Kgs.12.9|1Kgs 12:9]] = [[2Chr.10.4|2Chr 10:4]]; [[2Chr.10.9|2Chr 10:9]]. 

**2.** ***treat with contempt***, accusative of person [[2Sam.19.44|2Sam 19:44]]; [[Isa.23.9|Isa 23:9]]; [[Ezek.22.7|Ezek 22:7]] direct causative ***bring contempt, dishonour*** [[Isa.8.23|Isa 8:23]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִכְבִּיד‎</span>). **Pilpel** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular 

**1.** ***shake*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִלְקַל בַּחצִּים‎</span> [[Ezek.21.26|Ezek 21:26]] (in divination). 

**2.** (peculiarly) ***whet*** [[Eccl.10.10|Eccl 10:10]] (properly move quickly to and fro). **Hithpalpel** reflexive of 

**1.** : ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִחְקַלְקָ֑לוּ‎</span> [[Jer.4.24|Jer 4:24]] hills ***shook themselves***, shook.
